sections.title: Complete Event Management
sections.content:
From small workshops to large conferences, build event platforms that handle everything from ticket sales to check-in management.

Kliv's platform provides all the tools you need to create professional event booking systems.

items.title: Ticket Sales
items.description: Sell tickets online with multiple pricing tiers and promotional codes.

items.title: Registration Management
items.description: Handle attendee registration with custom forms and data collection.

items.title: Payment Processing
items.description: Accept payments securely with integrated payment gateways.

items.title: Check-in System
items.description: Manage event check-ins with QR codes and mobile scanning.

items.title: Analytics Dashboard
items.description: Track sales, attendance, and event performance with detailed reports.

items.title: Email Marketing
